name: cf-astro-blog-starter
description: Astro + Hono + Cloudflare Workers starter with built-in CMS, admin panel, and analytics

scripts.deploy: npm run db:migrate:remote && astro build && wrangler deploy
scripts.check: astro check && bunx biome check src/ tests/

DB.description: D1 database for blog posts, categories, tags, and analytics

MEDIA_BUCKET.description: R2 bucket for media uploads (images, files)

SESSION.description: KV namespace for session storage and caching

JWT_SECRET.description: Generate a random string using `openssl rand -hex 32`

ADMIN_USERNAME.description: Username for the admin panel login

ADMIN_PASSWORD_HASH.description: SHA-256 hash of your admin password. Generate with: `echo -n 'yourpassword' | sha256sum`

TURNSTILE_SECRET_KEY.description: Cloudflare Turnstile secret key from the [Turnstile dashboard](https://dash.cloudflare.com/turnstile)
